page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: The area lies to the West of Chichester,below the{South Downs}and extending almost to the{Solent Coast.It is a rural area with a large number and variety of farms.A distinctive feature is the flatness of this coastal plain. There are several residential areas {-small villages}and housing development along the main South Coast road.There are also a number of isolated farming communities with houses of historic interest. { Public transport}is limited particularly in the North of the area. There are few shops and only one Post Office. The traditional employment of working on the land has now been replaced by work in neighbouring towns in business and industry.{By pupils at {Funtington School.}
